verses.verse: Paul,<WG3972> an apostle,<WG652> (not of men,<WG444> neither<WG3761> by man,<WG444> but by Jesus<WG2424> Christ,<WG5547> and God<WG2316> the Father,<WG3962> who<WG3588> raised<WG1453> him from the dead;<WG3498>)
And all<WG3956> the brothers<WG80> which are with me, to the churches<WG1577> of Galatia:<WG1053>
Grace<WG5485> be to you and peace<WG1515> from God<WG2316> the Father,<WG3962> and from our Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ,<WG5547>

Who<WG3588> gave<WG1325> himself<WG1438> for our sins,<WG266> that he might deliver<WG1807> us from this<WG3588> present<WG1764> evil<WG4190> world,<WG165> according<WG2596> to the will<WG2307> of God<WG2316> and our Father:<WG3962>
To whom<WG3739> be glory<WG1391> for ever<WG165> and ever.<WG165> Amen.<WG281>
I marvel<WG2296> that you are so<WG3779> soon<WG5030> removed<WG3346> from him that called<WG2564> you into<WG1722> the grace<WG5485> of Christ<WG5547> to another<WG2087> gospel:<WG2098>
Which<WG3739> is not another;<WG243> but there be some<WG5100> that trouble<WG5015> you, and would<WG2309> pervert<WG3344> the gospel<WG2098> of Christ.<WG5547>

But though<WG1437> we, or<WG2228> an angel<WG32> from heaven,<WG3772> preach<WG2097> any other gospel<WG2097> to you than<WG3844> that which<WG3739> we have preached<WG2097> to you, let him be accursed.<WG331>

As we said<WG4280> before,<WG4280> so<WG2532> say<WG3004> I now<WG737> again,<WG3825> if<WG1487> any<WG1536> man preach<WG2097> any<WG1536> other gospel<WG2097> to you than<WG3844> that you have received,<WG3880> let him be accursed.<WG331>

For do I now<WG737> persuade<WG3982> men,<WG444> or<WG2228> God?<WG2316> or<WG2228> do I seek<WG2212> to please<WG700> men?<WG444> for if<WG1487> I yet<WG2089> pleased<WG700> men,<WG444> I should not be the servant<WG1401> of Christ.<WG5547>
But I certify<WG1107> you, brothers,<WG80> that the gospel<WG2098> which<WG3588> was preached<WG2097> of me is not after<WG2596> man.<WG444>
For I neither<WG3761> received<WG3880> it of man,<WG444> neither<WG3777> was I taught<WG1321> it, but by the revelation<WG602> of Jesus<WG2424> Christ.<WG5547>

For you have heard<WG191> of my conversation<WG391> in time<WG4218> past in the Jews'<WG2454> religion,<WG2454> how that beyond<WG2596> <WG5236> measure<WG5236> I persecuted<WG1377> the church<WG1577> of God,<WG2316> and wasted<WG4199> it:

And profited<WG4298> in the Jews'<WG2454> religion<WG2454> above<WG5228> many<WG4183> my equals<WG4915> in my<WG3450> own nation,<WG1085> being<WG5225> more<WG4056> exceedingly<WG4056> zealous<WG2207> of the traditions<WG3862> of my fathers.<WG3967>
But when<WG3753> it pleased<WG2106> God,<WG2316> who<WG3588> separated<WG873> me from my mother's<WG3384> womb,<WG2836> and called<WG2564> me by his grace,<WG5485>
To reveal<WG601> his Son<WG5207> in me, that I might preach<WG2097> him among<WG1722> the heathen;<WG1484> immediately<WG2112> I conferred<WG4323> not with flesh<WG4561> and blood:<WG129>

Neither<WG3761> went<WG424> I up to Jerusalem<WG2414> to them which were apostles<WG652> before<WG4253> me; but I went<WG565> into<WG1519> Arabia,<WG688> and returned<WG5290> again<WG3825> to Damascus.<WG1154>
Then<WG1899> after<WG2596> three<WG5140> years<WG2094> I went<WG424> up to Jerusalem<WG2414> to see<WG2477> Peter,<WG4074> and stayed<WG1961> with him fifteen<WG1178> days.<WG2250>
But other<WG2087> of the apostles<WG652> saw<WG1492> I none,<WG3756> save<WG1508> James<WG2385> the Lord's<WG2962> brother.<WG80>
Now<WG2236> the things which<WG3739> I write<WG1125> to you, behold,<WG2400> before<WG1799> God,<WG2316> I lie<WG5574> not.
Afterwards<WG1899> I came<WG2064> into<WG1519> the regions<WG2824> of Syria<WG4947> and Cilicia;<WG2791>
And was unknown<WG50> by face<WG4383> to the churches<WG1577> of Judaea<WG2449> which<WG3588> were in Christ:<WG5547>
But they had heard<WG191> only,<WG3440> That he which persecuted<WG1377> us in times<WG4218> past now<WG3568> preaches<WG2097> the faith<WG4102> which<WG3739> once<WG4218> he destroyed.<WG4199>
And they glorified<WG1392> God<WG2316> in me.
